notes:
This pack is pretty close. [Fathom Feeder] is powerful enough that taking it first can be worth it, but [Retreat to Emeria]  gives it a run for its money as it combos with itself and if you get any ally synergy to go with it at all, it can get completely out of hand .

Other than that, [Nettle Drone] is the runner up by a good margin. It leads you into one of the Grixis Devoid decks since provided all your spells are devoid it can do tons of damage to your opponent.
